content:
A spokesman for the Air Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Major Ilya Yevlash told how Ukrainian airfill systems are being knocked down by Russian Circon rockets.

Elijah Yevlash provided his comments duringEtherRadio Liberty on March 27, 2024.

According to him, hypersonic weapons are more than 5 strokes, and 1 Mach is about 1200 km per hour. But Ukraine has means to knock them down.

“This is a very, very fast weapon. If we talk about zircons, it is about 8-9 sting. It's incredibly fast. However, when these missiles enter the shock trajectory, their speed falls and is approximately 3700 km per hour. And it is at this point that we can use our complexes, which are anti -fighal. These are samp/t, Patriot, which can cause powerful lesions and knock down even such a weapon, ”said the AFS spokesman of the Armed Forces.

As reported by the Armyinform, in the defense forcesreportedAbout the number of Russian "zircons" in Crimea.
title: The air force reported ways of killing Russian "zircons"
